attributes.action: Give Disabled working home owners the same entitlements as disabled people on benefits for Disabled adaptions grants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that Disabled working home owners should be treated fairly in being assed for an adaptions grant as disabled people on benefits and shouldn't be penilised because they own their home and work, after all that is the right thing to do isn't it?
